peopleAlsoAsk.question: Who owns Maxim Commercial Capital?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Behzad Kianmahd. Behzad Kianmahd is Founder and Chairman of Maxim Commercial Capital. Prior to co-founding Maxim in 2008, he co-founded and served as CEO of an equipment finance company specializing in commercial heavy-duty trucks and trailers.
